abstract: Stephen P. Schaible, formerly a managing director and head of global energy banking at Citigroup, will join Evercore Partners in September as a senior managing director, where he cover the energy and chemicals sectors out of New York, Evercore said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Stephen P. Schaible, formerly a managing director and head of global energy banking at Citigroup, will join Evercore Partners in September as a senior managing director, where he cover the energy and chemicals sectors out of New York, Evercore said Thursday.

headline.main: Evercore Hires Energy Banker from Citi
